attributes.action: Pass legislation forbidding James Allen From Commentating on Formula One Races
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
James Allens commentaries are amateurish, biased, sycophantic and tedious.
His knowledge of this sport is poor, his mistakes and errors are inumerable and he is spoiling this sport for millions of fans. Replace him with someone more even handed in his comments, ie: Brundle.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
